 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גָּבִישׁ‎</span> **noun masculine** ==crystal== (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלְגָּבִישׁ‎</span> ***hail*** — on relation of meanings compare Greek <span class="bdbLangGreek">κρύσταλλος</span>, &amp; Ethiopic usage of <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>Lex. Aeth.759 —</sup> Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhNAAeAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAA0AB4AAAJxhI+py+0Po5wyBIqptXnu24CA2D0fmXBjaY6q87FmDKHyst36zvf+DwwKFblh5bQDqV4H2wUJszU5S1QRByVKDacu1Qu+prauMNL82jLHVQS5s3a/5bf49BiK0KZ2XKjPBsYDKCdo9Jd1qLjI2OiYUQAAOw=="> ***gypsum***, Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***gibšu***</u></abbr>, ***mass, abundance***, [[BDB#COT|COT]]<sup> Gloss</sup>) — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָא֯מוֺת וְגָבִישׁ‎</span> [[Job.28.18|Job 28:18]] ***coral and crystal***.
